channel.title: Gerlach|Washoe County|Nevada|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Gerlach|Washoe County|Nevada|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: CH-447 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on CH-447 North. Distance to Sand Pass Road, Squaw Valley Reservoir, Eagleville (California), Cedarville (California), and Alturas (California).

item.title: CH-447 North at CH-34
item.description: CH-447 North at CH-34 near Gerlach. Use CH-34 north for Leadville Canyon, Soldier Meadows, Boulder Reservoir, and Vya.

item.title: CH-447 North Approaching CH-34
item.description: CH-447 North approaching CH-34 near Gerlach. Use CH-34 north for Vya; CH-447 North for Cedarville (California).

item.title: Begin NV-447 - Gerlach
item.description: Begin NV-447 South in Gerlach. Washoe County 447 ends here.

item.title: Begin Washoe County 447 - Gerlach
item.description: Begin Washoe County 447 in Gerlach. NV-447 northbound ends here.
